Package tri.oxidationstates.calculator

package tri.oxidationstates.calculator
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BondValenceCalculator
    This is a simplified bond valence calculator that should be easier to use for this app than the one in the matsci oxidation analyzer.
    MixedValenceChargeBalanceFilter
    Filters out all combinations of ions that aren't charge balanced, or could not be made charge balanced by allowing one ion to have mixed valence.
    OxidationStateCalculator
    A general class for calculating the most likely sets of oxidation states for a given set of ion types.
    OxidationStateSet
    Contains a set of oxidation states assigned to ion types (i.e.
